titles.title: A bill to extend and modify the temporary reduction of duty on 4-methoxy-2-methyldiphenylamine.
A bill to extend and modify the temporary reduction of duty on 4-methoxy-2-methyldiphenylamine.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to grant temporarily duty-free treatment of 4-methoxy-2-methyldiphenylamine.
